desc: A mysterious relic used to evolve the Unit Grandt
lore: A mysterious red relic retrieved from a defeated commander of the God Army during the fall of the Elysian Kingdom. Similar relics can be found in the possession of other commanders belonging to the different troops of the God Army involved in the fall of the Elysian Kingdom. These relics of unknown purpose hold enormous amounts of divine energy. How the energy may be harnessed remains even a bigger mystery.
name: Ruby Relic
